subject: libpldm : Add decode API for QueryDeviceIdentifiers cmd
commitMessage:
libpldm : Add decode API for QueryDeviceIdentifiers cmd

QueryDeviceIdentifiers command is used by update agent to obtain the
firmware identifiers for the firmware device and its defined in DSP0267
Version 1.1.0 sec:10.1.

Tested: Unit tests passed

Signed-off-by: gokulsanker <gokul.sanker.v.g@intel.com>
Change-Id: I9ef81ce75aaedaae2fff9f5632ce16aa952cda17

Change has been successfully rebased and submitted as eca3e19d689666a4176062a49cd105cf30b05404 by Tom Joseph
updated
Do you plan to provide decode functions to decrypt the Descriptors data?
We should be returning PLDM_SUCCESS
updated
le32toh, PLDM byte ordering is little endian, so decode functions will have to do le32toh.
updated
sizeof(struct query_device_identifiers_resp), can avoid an interim variable
updated
descriptor_data is yet to be initialized at this point, initialize it.
removed, since memcpy is is removed
We can avoid a copy of the Descriptors, rather provide pointer to the Descriptor data and length in the descriptor_data field. The decode function for Descriptors can then consume it.
updated
This is not necessarily true, even if the out parameters are nullptr this could happen.
updated
auto
updated
This is not validated in this test.
We can add tests for the bad paths to keep the coverage high.
